title: The design of the universe
description: At Serious Play 2008, astrophysicist George Smoot shows stunning new images from deep-space surveys, and prods us to ponder how the cosmos -- with its giant webs of dark matter and mysterious gaping voids -- got built this way.
author: George Smoot
keywords: TED, talks, astronomy, culture, dark matter, design, physics, science, space, technology, time, telescopes, Best of the Web
